source:
spark.sql(f"""CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE crm_sanctioneddb.fact_opportunity
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/crm_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/fact_opportunity'
AS
SELECT
    COALESCE(source.Opportunity_id_nk, '0') AS Opportunity_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Business_Unit_Id_nk, 'MISSING') AS Business_Unit_Id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Practice_id_nk, 'MISSING') AS Practice_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Primary_Practice_Short_Name, 'MISSING') AS Primary_Practice_Short_Name,
    COALESCE(source.Solicitation_Short_Name, 'MISSING') AS Solicitation_Short_Name,
    COALESCE(source.CalendarDate, CAST('1900-01-01' AS DATE)) AS CalendarDate,
    COALESCE(source.Stage, 'MISSING') AS Stage,
    COALESCE(source.Geography_id_nk, 'MISSING') AS Geography_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Estimated_Value, 0.0) AS Estimated_Value,
    COALESCE(source.IQC_Ceiling, 0.0) AS IQC_Ceiling,
    COALESCE(source.Award_Date, CAST('1900-01-01' AS DATE)) AS Award_Date,
    COALESCE(source.IsActive, 1) AS IsActive,
    COALESCE(source.Effective_start_date, CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)) AS Effective_start_date,
    COALESCE(source.Effective_end_date, CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE)) AS Effective_end_date,
    current_date() AS Date_Created,
    current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
    current_user() AS Created_By,
    current_user() AS Updated_By,
    True as Current_Row_Ind

FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        O.Opportunity_id_nk,
        O.Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        P.Practice_id_nk,
        O.Primary_Practice AS Primary_Practice_Short_Name,
        O.Solicitation_Short_Name,
        cal.CalendarDate,
        O.Stage,
        geo.Geography_id_nk,
        COALESCE(O.Estimated_Value, 0.0) AS Estimated_Value,
        COALESCE(O.IQC_Ceiling, 0.0) AS IQC_Ceiling,
        CAST(O.Award_Date AS DATE) AS Award_Date,
        O.IsActive,
        CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE) AS Effective_start_date,
        CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE) AS Effective_end_date
    FROM crm_sanctioneddb.dim_opportunity O
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_businessunit BU ON BU.Business_Unit_Id_nk = O.Business_Unit_Id_nk
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_new_practice P ON P.practice = O.primary_practice
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_calendar cal ON CAST(cal.CalendarDate AS DATE) = CAST(O.Effective_Start_Date AS DATE)
    LEFT JOIN crm_sanctioneddb.dim_geography geo ON geo.Geography_id_nk = O.Primary_Location_Country_Key
) AS source;
